metadata.name: E-Kekle-Byte
metadata.description:
Stage 1: E-Kekle Byte (what you‚Äôre looking at) you gotta collect and stash those little E-Kekle-Bytes like a squirrel collecting nuts. 

You can only mint a maximum of 31 Stage 1 NFT per wallet.  

Open Edition for 72 hours. 

Stage 2: Once you got 5 E-Kekle Bytes, you can move onto the next stage, the Kekle-Big-Byte, and become a Kekle Discord OG legend. 

But don't get too overly excited, 'cause‚Ä¶

Stage 3: Involves burning of 2 Kekle-Big-Byte bad boys, and having brekkie on the beach (whatever that means). 

Plus,  holders of stage 3 NFTs will be entered into a lottery system for the ultimate Kekle Giveaway on Bitcoin Ordinals! 

And as what‚Äôs after stage 3, well, it's a future mystery. So keep your eyes peeled and your fingers crossed, and who knows what kind of crazy kekly stuffs you'll get into. 

Goodluck Kekles, may the KEKs be ever in your favor! üç≥ü§û
